title: Exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (e.g., 'test.zip') and begin the export to the zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The error message details the file with the same name in 'project2' as the problem (e.g., 'foo.txt' in 'project2').
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories without encountering any problems.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (e.g., 'test.zip') and begin the export to the zip file.
4. Confirm that the zip file is generated successfully without any error messages regarding files with the same name.
